abstract.text: Copies PCM audio data from a sample buffer into an audio buffer list.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The sample buffer containing the PCM audio data to be copied.
The frame offset number from which to begin the copy.
The total number of frames to copy.
The audio buffer list to populate.
must contain the same number of channels and its data buffers must be sized to hold the specified number of frames.
This API is specific to audio format sample buffers, and will return
if called with a non-audio sample buffer. It will return an error if the sample buffer doesn’t contain PCM audio data or if its data buffer isn’t ready.

abstract.text: Represent time-based audio-visual assets with essential data types.
A reference to a buffer of media data.
Copies PCM audio data from a sample buffer into an audio buffer list.
Returns an audio buffer list that contains the media data.
Creates an array of audio stream packet descriptions.
Returns a pointer to a constant array of audio stream packet descriptions.
Returns a block buffer that contains the media data.
Returns an image buffer that contains the media data.
Sets a block buffer of media data on a sample buffer.
Creates a block buffer that contains a copy of the data from an audio buffer list.
A structure that stores a variable-length array of audio buffers.
A structure that stores a variable-length array of audio buffers.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.

inlineContent.text: The sample buffer containing the PCM audio data to be copied.
The frame offset number from which to begin the copy.
The total number of frames to copy.
The audio buffer list to populate.
